item_category: Aznu is a new way of buying that premium branded phone you always wanted, but at a much more pocket-friendly price. With Aznu, you get a refurbished phone with the same camera, features and processor, plus a brand-new screen and a 12-month warranty. You also have the knowledge that buying Aznu helps reduce landfill and waste. We include a Sim tool so it's easy to pop your old card in, a year's worth of Norton 360 VPN Virus and Spam protection, and a cable and charger so it's ready to go! If it looks like new, it must be Aznu.
review_text: Was indeed of an upgrade from a Note 4, so researched what would be a good 'fit for purpose model' that wasn't too big, wouldn't break the bank yet has a decent sized screen. The S9 seemed to fit the bill and, having used the phone for a month now, I can report that it does fit the bill.  It has the usual Galaxy S features, is light-weight and stylish.  I purchased a case for added protection.  It's shiny and slippy so worth investing a few extra pounds to protect the device.
Very good phone.. easy to use value for money
Not Happy with this item Thank you
